unnormalised:
Kripa kạiṅ ma, 20/07/2024 tin-dhaṛi events@tajhotels.com re jawaab pe.
Reception do Taj Mahal Palace Hotel, Apollo Bunder, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001 re dohoy-a.
Aarhu baṛaay laagi' do, Ms. Sharma saao +91 22 6665 3366 number re jogajog pe, NH 10:00 baje khon Ayub 6:00 baje IST dhaṛi'.
normalised:
ᱫᱟᱭᱟᱠᱟᱛᱮ ᱡᱩᱞᱟᱭ ᱒᱐, ᱒᱐᱒᱔ ᱫᱷᱟᱹᱵᱤᱪ events@tajhotels.com ᱨᱮ RSVP ᱯᱮ᱾
ᱥᱟᱹᱜᱩᱱ ᱧᱟᱯᱟᱢ ᱫᱚ ᱛᱟᱡᱽ ᱢᱚᱦᱚᱞ ᱯᱟᱞᱮᱥ ᱦᱚᱴᱮᱞ, ᱟᱯᱚᱞᱚ ᱵᱚᱱᱫᱚᱨ, ᱢᱩᱢᱵᱟᱭ, ᱢᱚᱦᱟᱨᱟᱥᱴᱨ ᱔᱐᱐᱐᱐᱑ ᱨᱮ ᱦᱩᱭᱩᱜᱼᱟ᱾
ᱠᱩᱠᱞᱤ ᱞᱟᱹᱜᱤᱫ, ᱢᱤᱥ ᱥᱚᱨᱢᱟ ᱥᱟᱶ +91 22 6665 3366 ᱨᱮ ᱥᱮᱛᱟᱜ ᱑᱐:᱐᱐ ᱵᱟᱡᱮ ᱠᱷᱚᱱ ᱥᱟᱸᱡ ᱖:᱐᱐ ᱵᱟᱡᱮ ᱫᱷᱟᱹᱵᱤᱪ (IST) ᱨᱮ ᱡᱚᱜᱟᱡᱚᱜ ᱯᱮ᱾
text:
Kripa kạiṅ ma, 20/07/2024 tin-dhaṛi events@tajhotels.com re jawaab pe.
Reception do Taj Mahal Palace Hotel, Apollo Bunder, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001 re dohoy-a.
Aarhu baṛaay laagi' do, Ms. Sharma saao +91 22 6665 3366 number re jogajog pe, NH 10:00 baje khon Ayub 6:00 baje IST dhaṛi'.
